item.title: The Social Media Revolution – Facts and Figures – [video]
item.description: Related articles {.zemanta-related-title} The following video visualizes some recent social media statistics interestingly. Quite impressing how social media has developed over the last year. Facebook for example has gained 200 million users in just one year. That’s incredible … http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_oarMXGq3gIlFZ0z5Fm-Ng (via crowdspring and mashable) Related articles {.zemanta-related-title} Socialnomics Revisits ‘Social Media Revolution’ (socialtimes.

item.title: 100 eLearning Articles and White Papers
item.description: I have found a great collection of 100 eLearning articles and white papers through dontwasteyourtime. The full list of articles can be found at Dr. Tony Karrer’s weblog called elearningtech. (via cristinacost’s tweet)
